p: A total of 250 patients with laboratory-confirmed dengue virus infection were enrolled during the dengue outbreaks in Taiwan in 2014 to 2015 ( Fig. 1 a). Of the enrolled patients, 142 visited the hospital after 3â€¯days of the onset of symptoms (i.e., they did not come to hospital during their febrile phase of illness), whereas 108 patients were examined in both febrile and critical phases of dengue infection.
